game.name: Wothan Escape
game.description:
Wothan Escape is a most popular escaping game for boys. A man named Wothan has been trapped in a highly challenging and very dangerous mine. He is anxiously searching for the ways on how to escape from there and come back to his home. However, many obstacles are out there on his way to restrict him from reaching his destination. In this free online adventure game, you have to help him to complete the task. Play well, have a good time ahead!

The world popular adventurer Wothan is struggling hard after being trapped in one of the famous temples he has been trying to explore it. In this cool flash game, your task is to help him run away from there safely to his destination before it is too late. Many poisonous arrows and saws are waiting for him on his way. Help him to avoid them and reach the gate on each floor of the temple. Do not forget to collect as many coins as you can in order to help Wothan to fulfill his purpose of visiting this place.?

An easy and safe jump help Wothan to complete his task. Click to help him to run and jump towards the walls to hang on to them. In this latest adventure game for boys, you would surely have huge fun when you help the mighty Wothan to run from this dungeon. Avoid obstacles and spikes and make proper bounce and run on walls. The more coins you will collect, the easier it becomes for you to reach the exit door. Good luck to finish the game mission on a positive note!
